name: Aberration (Pisces Software)
description:
An original style scroll shooter where deflecting enemy projectiles is key to success. Journey through space to save Earth and destroy your enemies with upgradeable lasers, targeting torpedoes, area of explosion cannons, or deflecting their own projectiles.

This game plays best with a gamepad

Welcome to a future remote generation of the human race! Your purpose here is dire for evil inter-dimensional beings and their Annunaki serpents have disguised themselves as the Galactic Federation of Light! The evil ones have taken over Earth, have degraded all that walk upon it, and have crowned themselves God. Your mission as captain of the most advanced ship in the universe is to free Earth; however this will not be easy. Accompanied with you; your teammates will help guide you through this epic spiritual battle. These times are tough captain; are you ready to live an aberration?

Alpha 0.1.0

- Survival Mode (Arcade Minigame)
- Online Leaderboards (Official leaderboards)
- Preferences (Graphics/Audio/Controllers)
- Supports XBox/PS Controllers and legacy gamepads/joysticks
